snippet: President Obama on Tuesday rejected an appeal by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel to spell out a specific “red line” that Iran could not cross in its nuclear program.
abstract: President Obama rejects an appeal by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to set a specific threshold of progress in Iran's nuclear program that would trigger a military strike by the United States

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and HELENE COOPER

lead_paragraph: President Obama on Tuesday rejected an appeal by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel to spell out a specific “red line” that Iran could not cross in its nuclear program.

headline.seo: Obama Rebuffs Netanyahu on Nuclear ‘Red Line’ for Iran
headline.main: Obama Rebuffs Netanyahu on Setting Limits on Iran’s Nuclear Program
headline.print_headline: Obama Rebuffs Netanyahu on Setting Limits on Iran’s Nuclear Program
